```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(wordcloud)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)

#CSV imports
strFolder<-'C:\\File\\Lit_Evo_results\\'
df.word<-read.csv( paste(strFolder,'POS_word.csv',sep='') )
df.word.summary<-read.csv( paste(strFolder,'POS_word_summary.csv',sep='') )
df.punc<-read.csv( paste(strFolder,'POS_punctuation.csv',sep='') )
df.pos<-read.csv( paste(strFolder,'POS_all.csv',sep='') )
df.ss_s<-read.csv( paste(strFolder,'SS_simple.csv',sep='') )
df.ss_c<-read.csv( paste(strFolder,'SS_complex.csv',sep='') )
# dlog <- read.csv( paste(strFolder,'fanfics.csv',sep='') )
# books_words <- read.csv( paste(strFolder,'1.csv',sep='') )
# fanfic_words <- read.csv( paste(strFolder,'2.csv',sep='') )

#Duplicates for differences in variable names used
POS_word <- df.word
POS_punct <- df.punc
SS_simple <- df.ss_s

#For graph labeling
POS_word$lit_type<-gsub("Book","Classic Literature",POS_word$lit_type)
POS_punct$lit_type<-gsub("Book","Classic Literature",POS_punct$lit_type)
SS_simple$lit_type<-gsub("Book","Classic Literature",SS_simple$lit_type)
```
